# Tooltip A simple text tip that uses its children node as an anchor. To function correctly, the anchor node must be able to handle mouse events and focus or blur events. ## Usage ```tsx import {Tooltip} from '@gravity-ui/uikit';
Anchor
; ``` ## Properties | Name | Description | Type | Default | | :--------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :----------------------------------------------: | :-----: | | children | An anchor element for a `Tooltip`. Must accept a `ref` that will provide a DOM element. | `React.ReactElement` | | | content | Content that will be shown in the `Tooltip` | `React.ReactNode` | | | closeDelay | Number of ms to delay hiding the `Tooltip` after the hover ends | `number` | `0` | | openDelay | Number of ms to delay showing the `Tooltip` after the hover begins | `number` | `250` | | placement | `Tooltip` position relative to its anchor | [`PopupPlacement`](../Popup/README.md#placement) | | | qa | HTML `data-qa` attribute, used in tests | `string` | |
